languages.text: Трудно поверить, что цивилизация, способная создать столь мощное устройство, могла прийти в упадок.
It is hard to believe that a civilisation capable of creating a device as powerful as this one could have undergone such a decline.
languages.original_text: Трудно поверить, что цивилизация, способная создать столь мощное устройство, могла прийти в упадок.

traits.locale_text: It is hard to believe that a civilization capable of creating a device as powerful as this one could have undergone such a decline.
It is hard to believe that a civilization capable of creating a device as powerful as this one could have undergone such a decline.
It is hard to believe that a civilization capable of creating a device as powerful as this one could have undergone such a decline.
It is hard to believe that a civilisation capable of creating a device as powerful as this one could have undergone such a decline.
It is hard to believe that a civilisation capable of creating a device as powerful as this one could have undergone such a decline.

languages.text: 很难相信，能创造出如此强大装置的文明，竟会衰落至此。
languages.original_text: It is hard to believe that a civilisation capable of creating a device as powerful as this one could have undergone such a decline.

traits.locale_text: 很难相信，能创造出如此强大装置的文明，竟会衰落至此。

languages.text: これほど強力な装置を作れる文明が、これほど衰退したとは信じがたい。
languages.original_text: It is hard to believe that a civilisation capable of creating a device as powerful as this one could have undergone such a decline.

traits.locale_text: これほど強力な装置を作れる文明が、これほど衰退したとは信じがたい。

languages.text: Cuesta creer que una civilización capaz de crear un artefacto tan poderoso como este haya podido sufrir semejante declive.
languages.original_text: It is hard to believe that a civilisation capable of creating a device as powerful as this one could have undergone such a decline.

traits.locale_text: Cuesta creer que una civilización capaz de crear un artefacto tan poderoso como este haya podido sufrir semejante declive.

languages.text: Es ist kaum zu glauben, dass eine Zivilisation, die ein derart mächtiges Gerät erschaffen kann, einen solchen Niedergang erleben kann.
languages.original_text: It is hard to believe that a civilisation capable of creating a device as powerful as this one could have undergone such a decline.

traits.locale_text: Es ist kaum zu glauben, dass eine Zivilisation, die ein derart mächtiges Gerät erschaffen kann, einen solchen Niedergang erleben kann.

languages.text: On a du mal à concevoir qu'une civilisation capable de créer un engin aussi puissant ait pu connaître un tel déclin.
languages.original_text: It is hard to believe that a civilisation capable of creating a device as powerful as this one could have undergone such a decline.

traits.locale_text: On a du mal à concevoir qu'une civilisation capable de créer un engin aussi puissant ait pu connaître un tel déclin.

languages.text: Bu kadar güçlü bir cihaz yaratabilecek kapasitedeki bir uygarlığın böylesine gerilemiş olduğuna inanmak güç.
languages.original_text: It is hard to believe that a civilisation capable of creating a device as powerful as this one could have undergone such a decline.
